title: (x) "Are You Tough Enough?" Muscle Body magazine cover sans - FF Ginger {Jan E}
content:
Yes, that font, please. It’s on the tip of my brain...but I just can’t remember what it is...Thanks in advance for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907033548im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mag_cover_5055.jpg)

author: dylan

comments.content: A whole lot of it too. I heard serifs were for wusses.
